title: Preseason & Runes 7.22 Update
body:
Hey, everyone!

It’s Riot Sparkle, back with another Runes Reforged & Preseason update today. No graphics this time, sorry. :) 

Runes Reforged just went live on all regions, and we’ve found a few bugs with this massive change (surprise!). Some bugs can be fixed this patch but other fixes will come in the 7.23 patch. Here's a list of runes bugs we're currently aware of and actively working to solve.**

_Runes Bug Hit List_

-  **BUG:** The runes editing window closes when the last player has locked in their champion (“loadout stage”), resulting in a lot of confusion and unfinished pages. Then the dropdown shows/selects the wrong page. Also known as “the annoying AF champ select bug”. 
**FIX: **We are currently working on a fix for this. Top priority bug, but it looks like it’s a somewhat complicated one. 

-  **BUG:** Settings for runes are not saving between pages or log out (long description checkbox and grid mode).
**FIX: ** The fix for this one should go out in 7.23 

-  **BUG: ** Renaming rune pages sometimes bugs out. This bug may make it look like your page isn’t saving - but it’s usually only the name. To avoid this bug, hit the save button instead of hitting "Enter" when making the title for a page.
**FIX:** We’re working on this bug at the moment. 

- ** BUG:** Tooltips are broken or incorrect in different languages.
**FIX: ** Currently working on these and work will be ongoing. 

- ** BUG: **Sometimes the runes panel crashes in champion select and you're left unable to edit your rune page. The window will either show up black or not show up at all. 
**FIX (?): **We’re still investigating this one but haven't found a consistent way to make this happen.  It would help us a lot if you post your logs in the comments if you hit this bug! 

- ** WAIT, NO EMERGENCY GAMEPLAY BUGS?: ** There are currently no game breaking bugs that we know of right now (game crashes, one shot PBE Nunu etc.). We’ll be fixing these as we find them.
*FIX:* We’ll be monitoring and fixing these ones as they're discovered.

**Please note this is not a comprehensive list, just wanted to hit the big ones here. Special shout out to our early bird players for helping us catch all of these!

Thank you all for your patience as we work through these. 

Okay and now for something completely different. We’ve seen some questions crop up around Preseason rewards and we wanted to do a little review of all the important bits regarding your goodies. [Check out the longer FAQ for more in depth answers and additional questions around Preseason](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ). 

_Quick Rewards FAQ_

**Q:** I just logged in but I don’t see my rewards. Where are they?
**A: **You should receive your Preseason rewards after completing one game of League (check your missions panel!). And yes, you must complete that game. No AFK’ing or disconnecting early.  

**Q: **Wait, so I finished my game but my Blue Essence total looks the same. Did I not get my Blue Essence? 
**A:** After you complete your game, head over to the Loot tab. It should have a glowing dot next to it. You can open your Blue Essence orbs there to add them to your total.

**Q: ** I saw that I was receiving Epic Skins, how do I see which ones I got? 
**A:** A pop up notification should show up the same way [as if a friend had gifted you](https://i.imgur.com/4MmX4zh.gif) after you complete your game. Occasionally, this notification will time out before you see it. If that happens, click the notification bell to see if you received your Epic skin(s). If you don’t receive your Epic skins (double check your store history to make sure) please [send us a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can help you out. 

https://i.imgur.com/SgDElX1.png

_A Note About Preseason Rewards & Realm Transferring 
_
If you are one of the folks who specifically transferred to a _new server when it had just opened_ and you feel you did not get the correct rewards for games playes and runes purchased, please [send us a support ticket with your account information](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We’re aware of some issues with account history not transferring properly with newly opened servers specifically. If you transferred to an existing server using the regular Store interface (ex: NA → EUW etc.) you should not experience any issues with your rewards.

-----------------------------------

**EDIT:** If you are experiencing FPS drops, match history of your game(s) would really help us! Extra credit if you can get us your Game-R3d Log from the game you experienced poor FPS in (possibly on a pastebin). You can find it here: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs

These 2 pieces of info will help us a lot in figuring out what's causing this

I submitted a bug report about this, but there is currently what appears to be a major bug (or at least a very negative unintended consequence) with the Kleptomancy Keystone. Kleptomancy overwrites placed control wards if your inventory is full. This is very bad, especially in the late game, as this makes precise vision control nearly impossible, and punishes you for damaging an opponent.

One option could be the gold equivalent to selling the ward type if your inventory is full and a ward would be overwritten, rather than overwriting intentional vision.
What do you mean "overwrites" placed control wards? Like it places a control ward for you or something else?

He means say I have a control ward in the baron pit that I obviously want there.  I proc klepto on someone and it gives me a control ward.  If my inventory is full it puts it at their feet which is likely in a useless place and since I can only have one control ward on the map my one at baron is now gone.
Ahhh. I will deliver this feedback. I can see how that would be annoying with control wards specifically.

This isn't really a bug, but why doesn't Grasp of the undying **not** state how much health you've gained from using it in the match-history? It only displays the damage dealt by it and I don't think the damage dealt is why you'd necessarily want to take it. And also the healing factor is also a stat that can't be viewed.
The odd thing about this is that the stats for max-health gain and healing are displayed in-game when you hover the tool tip (and other keystones like aery display shielded and damage dealt both in-game and in match history).

And I don't know if anyone else has experienced this but I've had the stat tracker for Kleptomancy break in [this Soraka game](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2640911635/37926959?tab=overview) where it paused at 235 gold generated and like 16 items looted but then never went up every time I went to stat check. The friendly gangplank on my team was also stuck at about 165 gold or so the entire match as well.
I could not tell if perhaps the keystone stopped working or it's a bug with the tracker but with other games where I've tried using it the kleptomancy, it generated about 1k so I'm assuming that it's an issue with the stat tracker.
